original_title: Incesto en los Andes: La maldición de los jarjachas
overview: In a town there are strange deaths, apparently caused by jarjachas, monstrous creatures that incestuous lovers become at night. Cirilo, Mateo and Remigio, with the help of a priest, will try to hunt them down and eliminate them.
title: Incesto en los Andes: La maldición de los jarjachas
